1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: NBC presents the new relationship competition series "Ready For Love", as 36 women vie for the hearts of three handsome, successful gentlemen.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: After a shocking elimination in the premiere episode, it is now Ben Patton and Ernesto Arguello's turn to meet their ladies. Twelve women compete for quality time with businessman Ben, while the other twelve women vie for the affections of charitable entrepreneur Ernesto.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Finding the chemistry. - Now that Tim, Ernesto and Ben have each chosen their top eight women, it is time to get to know their women on a more personal level.

4.title: A Vineyard, a Trivia Contest, and a Food Fight: Hour 1
4.plot: Wine and Secrets. - Ben takes his ladies on a romantic group date to a winery, where he establishes more connections during his one-on-ones. Tim decides to let loose and fun with a group trivia date where one of the women reveals shocking secrets about her past.

5.title: A Vineyard, a Trivia Contest, and a Food Fight: Hour 2
5.plot: A Kiss Here, A Kiss There. - After the dramatic group trivia date, Tim chooses two of his lucky ladies to go on an exhilarating helicopter ride over Los Angeles. Ernesto spices things up with a cooking date where each of the women vie to be the first one kissed by the Latin lover.

6.title: Vegas, in Love and War
6.plot: Tim takes his five women to his hometown of Santa Barbara, California, where he continues to connect with his ladies on a deeper level. Ernesto surprises his four women on a date to a private lake where secrets expose themselves. Ben takes his five women to Vegas where the ladies end up competing for his affections, leading to a shocking elimination.

7.title: Love in Paradise
7.plot: Ben, Ernesto and Tim narrow down their women as they go on a journey to paradise on the beautiful island of Hawaii. The stakes are high as the women must fight to survive, getting one step closer to falling in love with the man of their dreams. Preeminent matchmaker Amber Kelleher-Andrews, relationship author Tracy McMillan and professional dating coach Matthew Hussey coach the women on forming compatible relationships with each of the eligible men.

8.title: Meet the Parents
8.plot: It is time to get serious when the girls are introduced to each of the guys' families. The pressure is on to see which girl can make the best first impression to win the approval of their potential future in-laws. Preeminent matchmaker Amber Kelleher-Andrews, relationship author Tracy McMillan and professional dating coach Matthew Hussey coach the women on forming compatible relationships with each of the eligible men.

9.title: Ernesto Finds Love
9.plot: After introducing the women to their families last week, it is now the bachelors turn to travel to the girls' hometowns. With only three contestants left in each house, which families will give the green light to move things forward, and which will relationships prove to be doomed? Will Ernesto find the love of his life? Preeminent matchmaker Amber Kelleher-Andrews, relationship author Tracy McMillan and professional dating coach Matthew Hussey coach the women on forming compatible relationships with each of the eligible men.

10.title: An Engagement and a Song
10.plot: Love is at an all-time high during an unforgettable season finale. Tim and Ben take their final ladies to their home towns for one final date. Then, live on-stage, the two men will make the biggest decision of their lives. Preeminent matchmaker Amber Kelleher-Andrews, relationship author Tracy McMillan and professional dating coach Matthew Hussey coach the women on forming compatible relationships with each of the eligible men.

-1.title: Vegas in Love and War
-1.plot: Tim takes his five women to his hometown of Santa Barbara, California, where he continues to connect with his ladies on a deeper level. Ernesto surprises his four women on a date to a private lake where secrets expose themselves. Ben takes his five women to Vegas where the ladies end up competing for his affections, leading to a shocking elimination.

imdb.plot outline: Dating competition that answers the age-old question: How far would you go to find your soul mate? Three of America's most eligible guys are about to find out. Eligible women across America participate and find out how easy it can be to find true love. In the first Facebook partnership of its kind, women can log on and apply to participate in the experience of a lifetime. Eva Longoria hand selects three successful and handsome men who are committed to finding the right women with whom to share their lives.
imdb.title: Ready for Love
plot: Dating competition that answers the age-old question: How far would you go to find your soul mate? Three of America's most eligible guys are about to find out. Eligible women across America participate and find out how easy it can be to find true love. In the first Facebook partnership of its kind, women can log on and apply to participate in the experience of a lifetime. Eva Longoria hand selects three successful and handsome men who are committed to finding the right women with whom to share their lives.::Simpson, William III
